casebody.data:
GLOUCESTER COUNTY SCHOOL BOARD, petitioner,
v.
G.G., By His Next Friend and Mother, Deirdre GRIMM. No. 16-273. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 28, 2016.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit granted limited to Questions 2 and 3 presented by the petition.
